question.text: For <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> and <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math>, the correct statement is

options.text: <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math>  is coloured and  <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math>  is colourless

<math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> is colourless and <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> is coloured

solution.text: In <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> it absorbs red colour light so it shows complementary colour green, while in the case of <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> there is very weak splitting so the light absorbed will be in infrared region so its complementary colour is not in visible region of light hence it appears colourless.
